description.value:
Aura 5

Enemies cannot teleport into or out of the aura, and they cannot use phasing while within the aura.

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Fire, Necrotic

Standard

Reach 4

+25 vs Fortitude; 2d10+8 fire and necrotic damage, and ongoing 10 fire and necrotic damage (save ends).

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Necrotic

Standard

Reach 3

+25 vs Reflex; 2d8+8 necrotic damage, and the target is marked until the end of Memory of the Prophecy's next turn.

At-Will

Standard

Memory of the Prophecy makes two claw attacks and one bite attack

At-Will ✦ Necrotic

Immediate Interrupt

Reach 3

Trigger: When an enemy within 3 squares of and marked by memory of the prophecy leaves a square or makes an attack that doesn't include memory of the prophecy as a target, at-will

+25 vs Fortitude; 2d8+8 necrotic damage, and the target slides 2 squares, ends its movement, and is weakened until the end of Memory of the Prophecy's next turn.

Recharge 4-6 ✦ Fire, Necrotic

Standard

Close blast 5

+25 vs Reflex; 2d12+8 fire and necrotic damage, and ongoing 10 necrotic damage (save ends). Miss: Half damage.

Encounter

Free

Trigger: When first bloodied, encounter

Breath weapon recharges, and Memory of the Prophecy uses it

Encounter ✦ Conjuration, Fear, Fire

Standard

Close burst 10

Targets enemies; +25 vs Will; the target is stunned until the end of Memory of the Prophecy's next turn. Effect: Memory of the Prophecy conjures a wall of flames within the burst that lasts until the end of her next turn. The wall is 10 squares long and 6 squares high. It blocks line of sight, and its space is lightly obscured. Any creature that starts its turn adjacent to the wall takes 5 fire damage, and any creature that enters a square of the wall or starts its turn there takes 15 fire damage. Sustain Minor: The wall persists.

Trigger: When memory of the prophecy hits with a natural attack roll of 18-20

The attack becomes a critical hit, dealing 4d6 extra damage.

system.biography:
HP 532; Bloodied 266
Resist 15 fire, 15 necrotic, insubstantial Vulnerable 10 radiant Immune disease, poison 		Init +12 | AP 2 | Save +5
AC 34Fort 34Ref 31Will 32
Speed fly 10 (hover); phasing
Ability ScoresStr 26 (+18)
Con 22 (+16)		Dex 10 (+10)
Int 20 (+15)		Wis 19 (+14)
Cha 22 (+16)
Languages Common, Draconic, Elven, Giant, Primordial
Alignment Unaligned
Skills Arcana +20, History +20, Insight +19Senses Darkvision,Truesight 3
Passive Perception 24 | Insight 29
